Queries.Query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Employees ( Id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, Name TEXT NOT NULL, Email TEXT NOT NULL, Phone TEXT NOT NULL, JoinedDate TEXT NOT NULL, ExtraFields TEXT )
SELECT Name, Email, Phone, JoinedDate, ExtraFields FROM Employees ORDER BY Id LIMIT @limit OFFSET @offset
SELECT Name, Email, Phone, JoinedDate, ExtraFields FROM Employees WHERE Name = @name COLLATE NOCASE LIMIT 1
INSERT INTO Employees (Name, Email, Phone, JoinedDate, ExtraFields) VALUES (@name, @email, @phone, @joinedDate, @extraFields)
